name: Pigfly
description:
PIGFLY

The people are hungry - and you're on the menu. Save yourself and your fellow pigflies from being turned in tonight's dinner at the Bacon Buffet. 

Controls:

- Click + drag to move (you can select any pig within your group)

- Join with more pigflies along the way

-Watch out for anyone who looks hungry!

- Pigflies will join with the nearest pig in your group, forming pig-chains. If a pig is killed, all the other's in it's chain will also die :(

Game, art + music by me.

Submitted to GMTK Game Jam 2021

WARNING: there may be bugs
